fixtures.name: default

context.heading: Important
context.text: For safety, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you're taking any other medicines, including herbal medicines, vitamins or supplements.

fixtures.html:
Important:

For safety, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you're taking any other medicines, including herbal medicines, vitamins or supplements.

fixtures.name: with custom heading

context.heading: School, nursery or work
context.text: Stay away from school, nursery or work until all the spots have crusted over. This is usually 5 days after the spots first appeared.

fixtures.html:
Important: School, nursery or work

Stay away from school, nursery or work until all the spots have crusted over. This is usually 5 days after the spots first appeared.
